## Including Plots

```{r}
data <- readr::read_csv(file = "data/2017.csv")
data$Happiness.Score <- as.integer(data$Happiness.Score)

```

##plot


```{r}
library (ggplot2)
g <- ggplot(data = data, 
mapping = aes(x = Economy..GDP.per.Capita. , y = Happiness.Score, color = Health..Life.Expectancy.)
)
data$Happiness.Score
g <- g + geom_smooth()
g <- g + geom_point()
g
